scripts.add-publish-submodule: echo --Add .publish submodule-- && ( test ! -d .publish || git rm -f .publish ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/itu-library-1812-build.git .publish
scripts.add-dev-data-submodule: echo --Add .dev-data submodule-- && ( test ! -d .dev-data || git rm -rf .dev-data ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/itu-library-1812-dev-data.git .dev-data
scripts.add-templates-submodule: echo --Add .bem/templates submodule-- && ( test ! -d .bem/templates || git rm -rf .bem/templates ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/bem-templates-react-ts-v1.git .bem/templates
scripts.postinstall: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all install-patches add-templates-submodule add-dev-data-submodule add-publish-submodule
scripts.stylelint: echo --Postcss linting-- && stylelint src/**/*.css --syntax scss && echo No postcss problems found
scripts.eslint: echo --JS source code linting-- && eslint . --ext .js && echo No JS problems found
scripts.tslint: echo --TS source code linting-- && tslint -p . --format stylish --exclude "**/*.{js,jsx}" && echo No TS problems found
scripts.lint: echo --Lint all source code-- && npm-run-all stylelint eslint tslint
scripts.test: echo --Run all lintings and tests-- && npm-run-all lint jest
scripts.serve: echo --Run static server for build-- && serve -s build
scripts.pack-build-SAMPLE: echo --Pack build for demo server-- && rm -f build-pack.zip && zip -rq build-pack.zip build
scripts.commit-build-SAMPLE: echo --Commit build for demo server-- && cd build && git add . -Av && git commit -am "auto-commit" && git push
scripts.publish: echo --Publish build to demo-server-- && cd .publish && git pull && rm -Rf * && cp -Rfu ../*.md ../build/* . && git add . -Av && git commit -am "auto-commit" && git push && cd ..
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
